title.rendered: Head of Cyber Awareness speaking at Risk & Compliance Leaders Summit 2019

content.rendered:
Head of Cyber Awareness, Rob Shapland, is speaking at The Risk and Compliance Leaders Summit 2019 at the Hilton, Vienna on 6 & 7 November, 2019.

Catch Rob’s presentation at 11.10am on Day 1 of the event: How hackers attack and how to fight back: Lessons from a world famous cyber hacker. 

Find out more about the event at riskcompliance.wbresearch.com/

Book a meeting with Rob Shapland at The Risk and Compliance Leaders Summit, 2019
